## Requirement - what kind of business use case are you trying to solve?
Use Kafka in between Jaeger Collector and Jaeger Ingester

## Problem - what in Jaeger blocks you from solving the requirement?
We see a great number of errors like the following (running v1.9.0):
```
{"level":"error","ts":1550003610.8029132,"caller":"kafka/writer.go:59","msg":"kafka server: Message was too large, server rejected it to avoid allocation error.","stacktrace":"github.com/jaegertracing/jaeger/plugin/storage/kafka.NewSpanWriter.func2\n\t/home/travis/gopath/src/github.com/jaegertracing/jaeger/plugin/storage/kafka/writer.go:59"}
```

Also, the topic was created with the default `max.message.bytes` value: `1000012` and the broker has a bigger `max.messages.bytes` then the topic.

At first I thought the issue was that we received a single big span, but even after switching from `json` to `protobuf` we are still seeing it (I presume `protobuf` is slightly more compact than `json`).

I started digging and I think the problem is actually with Sarama: https://github.com/Shopify/sarama/issues/1140

This seems to be fixed by this: https://github.com/Shopify/sarama/commit/4c93f1f002740d2d8604ba4f82d2c87a4d49a1ba

## Proposal - what do you suggest to solve the problem or improve the existing situation?
1. Upgrade to Sarama to 1.20.1 (currently at 1.20.0)
2. Ideally, I would like to expose the `MaxMessageBytes` config and the `CompressionCodec` as well
3. Expose more stats from Sarama (these would be helpful https://github.com/Shopify/sarama/blob/46cf3e2cf1acef7876068f66cf69ec31aad2d0b2/produce_request.go#L78-L79)

## Any open questions to address
- I plan to send a PR for 1 and another one for 2 and 3
title: Ingester: Message was too large, server rejected it to avoid allocation error.
